message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but $11,000 is quite a bit lower than I'm comfortable with. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?

I understand your perspective, Alice, but $13,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so I'll propose $12,500. Can we agree on that?
